article_title: If Carly is 'Ugly' Then What Is Whoopi?
article_text: Lastly, and please forgive me, but who the heck are Whoopi and Joy Behar to rip on any lady’s looks? Do Goldberg and her hunter-orange-headed, unfunny friend not have any mirrors? Good Lawd, girls. Talk about the putz calling kettle black.

article_metadata.description:
After the last GOP debate, the "women" of The View pulled out their dragon-nails and said that Carly Fiorina looked "demented" and her face was worthy of a Halloween mask. 
.05/26/2016 11:18:41AM EST.
article_metadata.author: Doug Giles

article_summary:
Lastly, and please forgive me, but who the heck are Whoopi and Joy Behar to rip on any lady’s looks?
Talk about the putz calling kettle black.
Do Goldberg and her hunter-orange-headed, unfunny friend not have any mirrors?
Good Lawd, girls.
